channel.title: Neptos - Recruiting
channel.description:
I'm here to recruit developers in to this project which most likely will be succesful.
It's a 718 loading 742 cache, I have amazing idea for it.
[b]The idea[/b] This would be the worlds first 'open-world' RSPS which means theres content around the world and there wouldn't be actual home, I think people would love this since EOC ruined RS competely but it won't be a re-make though, we could add EXP rates that people can choose and other little utilities. [b]The project's name is Neptus.[/b]
[b]What you need to join?[/b] Java programming experience. Skype account. You must be dedicated to this project.
About Myself You probably know me, my name is Fuzen Seth in r-s + RuneLocus, I have made succesful servers such as Mentios, also Enso is incredible RSPS.
Some features this project will include -World-wide content. -Minigames (Artisan's Workshop) and other amazing, unique minigames. -Quest system -Grand Exchange (makes this really fun since it's open-world) And much more, can't list all. -World content (buckets, sawmills, port phasmatys, ship charter, world-wide ship travelling, fairy rings) -Full lobby to make it realistic as possible but I have nearly done it :)
I have money also to setup us online for public. But this project will be long in development that's why I need some serious developers.
[u][b]Contact me by using skype: NexonLTD[/b][/u]
[img]http://puu.sh/4WgtX.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4Wgzt.jpg[/img]

@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Also is there a reason the name and logo don’t match?[/quote]

This proves I can’t use photoshop. Removed logo haha it looks noobish.

item.title: Neptos - Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

I’m here to recruit developers in to this project which most likely will be succesful.

It’s a 718 loading 742 cache, I have amazing idea for it.

The idea
This would be the worlds first ‘open-world’ RSPS which means theres content around the world and there wouldn’t be actual home, I think people would love this since EOC ruined RS competely but it won’t be a re-make though, we could add EXP rates that people can choose and other little utilities. The project’s name is Neptus.

What you need to join?
Java programming experience.
Skype account.
You must be dedicated to this project.

About Myself
You probably know me, my name is Fuzen Seth in r-s + RuneLocus, I have made succesful servers such as Mentios, also Enso is incredible RSPS.

Some features this project will include
-World-wide content.
-Minigames (Artisan’s Workshop) and other amazing, unique minigames.
-Quest system
-Grand Exchange (makes this really fun since it’s open-world)
And much more, can’t list all.
-World content (buckets, sawmills, port phasmatys, ship charter, world-wide ship travelling, fairy rings)
-Full lobby to make it realistic as possible but I have nearly done it

I have money also to setup us online for public. But this project will be long in development that’s why I need some serious developers.

Contact me by using skype: NexonLTD
